txt.en:
'You have done much good work to help me, and I am very grateful for that, but I fear the most difficult parts are still ahead of us. Bedwur is the auctioneer here... he is the local leader of the Ox-clan, and a very powerful man. He is also as corrupt as they come, having long ago given his will to Saruman.

'Unfortunately, he is an evil I must deal with if I am to pay off my debts. Any transaction of noticeable size must go through his auction, and he happily takes a price from each lot.

'I need some time to take inventory and get everything cleaned and ready for sale. While I do that, you go talk with Bedwur and secure a position in the upcoming auction. You can find him near the centre of town by the auction-platform.'
'So, you represent Andras, do you, duvodiad? I hope he has brought something worth selling this time. I do not tolerate my time being spent and my money wasted.'
'Bedwur will likely ask you to do some small tasks. I would be grateful if you could, while I prepare things here.'
Avardin is run by Bedwur, a leader among the Ox-clan who runs the auctions and controls the local economy.
Bedwur is in the centre of Avardin at the auction-platform.\n\nAndras asked you to speak with Bedwur regarding the auction.
